Buff.Name: Spiral Charge
Buff.Description: Switches to a two-handed Magic Gladiator. / Increases attack power and defense. / Increases the use distance of Chaos Blade and Fire Blood, and explodes a powerful sword when attacking 3 times.

Buff.Name: Crusher Charge
Buff.Description: Switches to one-handed Magic Gladiator. / Attack speed and defense are increased. / Chaos Blade and Ice Blood skill use distance increases, and when attacking 3 times, it explodes a powerful sword.

Buff.Name: Elemental Charge
Buff.Description: Switches to a wizard type Magic Gladiator. / Increases wizardry and defense. / Increases Havok Spear skill use distance and explodes a powerful Nova when attacking 3 times.

Buff.Name: Damage Increase
